Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *njen ): phonetic 肰 ( OC *njen ) + semantic 火 ( “ fire ” ) – to burn. The derivative 燃 ( OC *njen ) preserves the original word.
In the modern form, the top-left component 肉 (“meat”) has been turned on its side, appearing more like 夕 (“evening”) with an extra stroke ( 𱼀 ( 𱼀 ) ); compare 祭 , 將 .
